<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === ***  THIS POLICY IS READ ONLY ***"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === If you have the need to customize this policy"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This list contains the supported grant_types accepted at the /token endpoint."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="bf601700-d7eb-47a3-b868-ff4a746d8a63"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Configured Grant Types"/>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_jwt}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_jwt}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_password}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_password}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_refresh_token}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_refresh_token}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_authorization_code}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_authorization_code}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_client_credentials}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_client_credentials}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_saml}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_saml}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_token_exchange}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_token_exchange}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_device_authorization_code}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_device_authorization_code}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${grant_type_ciba}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${grant_type_ciba}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="== CUSTOM"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// see if the incoming ${grant_type} variable is in the ${grant_type_custom} list"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="grant_type_custom"/>
                <L7p:PatternContainsVariables booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Regex stringValue="\b${grant_type}{1,128}\b"/>
                <L7p:RegexName stringValue="Check if custom grant type"/>
                <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            </L7p:Regex>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTE5"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
